scripts.dev:test: npm run generate:pages:collections && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=test next dev
scripts.dev:prod: npm run generate:pages:collections && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=prod next dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run generate:pages:collections" "npm run start:db" "npm run dev:local"
scripts.dev:seed: npm run generate:pages:collections && concurrently "npm run start:db" "npm run dev:seed:app"
scripts.dev:seed:app: npm run seed:test-data && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=local next dev -H 0.0.0.0 -p 3000
scripts.build: npm run generate:pages:collections && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=test next build
scripts.build:local: concurrently "npm run generate:pages:collections" "npm run start:db" "npm run generate:pages:collections && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=local next build"
scripts.build:prod: npm run generate:pages:collections && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=prod next build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:db" "cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation ENV=local next start"
scripts.test:fe: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm fe npm run test:fe:native
scripts.test:fe:watch: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm -p 8080:8080 fe npm run test:fe:native:watch
scripts.test:be:native: npm run generate:pages:collections && npx playwright test -c playwright-be.config.ts
scripts.test:be:native:shard: npm run generate:pages:collections && npx playwright test --shard=$SHARD_INDEX/$SHARD_TOTAL -c playwright-be.config.ts
scripts.test:be:watch:native: npm run generate:pages:collections && npx playwright test -c playwright-be.config.ts --ui-port=8080 --ui-host=0.0.0.0
scripts.test:be: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm be npm run test:be:native
scripts.test:be:watch: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml run --rm -p 8080:8080 be npm run test:be:watch:native
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss
